duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops project plan and drives project milestones.
Facilitates kick off meetings, manages the project scope, and ensures it fits within the project plan.
Facilitates Scrum ceremonies with multiple small development teams.
Provides day-to-day direction to project resources.
Works with cross-functional teams to manage dependencies.
Coaches the team to be more consistent, predictable, and to size stories.
Skillfully removes obstacles and distractions that may impede the team from meeting goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or relevant field (Master's preferred)
